page.description: Reset the query as if it had just been created.
page.original:
SQL::DeleteStatement::Reset() Syntax .Reset() Argument Description A SQL::DeleteStatement object.
Description The Reset() function resets the values in the SQL::DeleteStatement object as if it had just been created. Examples dim del as SQL::DeleteStatement del.SQLstatement = "DELETE FROM Customer WHERE lastname > 'G'" ? del.SQLStatement = "DELETE FROM CustomerWHERE (lastname > 'G')" del.reset() ? del.SQLStatement = "DELETE FROM"
See Also SQL::DeleteStatement Object Limitations
